Package com.i2group.apollo.alertfeedservice

The i2 Analyze alert feed service provides clients with the ability to create, subscribe to, and unsubscribe from alert feeds in the Analysis Repository.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAlertFeedService
    A set of methods for creating, subscribing to, and unsubscribing from alert feeds.

Package com.i2group.apollo.alertfeedservice Description

The i2 Analyze alert feed service provides clients with the ability to create, subscribe to, and unsubscribe from alert feeds in the Analysis Repository.

The alert feed service is a facade on the command service. It uses features of the command service to manipulate domain-specific objects (alert feeds) in the repository.

Web methodDescription
CreateAlertFeed Creates an alert feed on an item or a set in the Analysis Repository, and configures the ability of other users to subscribe to the feed.
SubscribeCurrentUserToAlertFeeds Subscribes the current user to one or more alert feeds, specifying how they want to receive alerts.
UnsubscribeCurrentUserFromAlertFeeds Unsubscribes the current user from one or more alert feeds.

The subscription mechanism uses a system of tokens to represent subscription relationships. Clients receive a token when they subscribe to an alert feed, and they must submit that token when they want to unsubscribe.

Since:
3.0
